title: A Cowboy's Last Wish Ride on His Favorite Horse at Bobby's Ranch

subtasks: Bringing horse feed to the location
Dispensing horse feed into the horse's mouth or container
Praising or rewarding the horse verbally
Ensuring the horse is eating the feed
Picking up a container (e.g., feed bucket)
Transporting the container to the horse
Getting close to the horse safely
Checking if the horse is responsive to commands
Providing positive reinforcement to the horse
